wl:page.dc:subject: firmament; kind; evening; darkness; light; herb; earth

wl:sentence.wl:pos: IN DT VBG NNP VBD DT NN CC DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC DT NN VBD IN NN , CC NN : CC NN NN VBD CD IN DT NN IN DT JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:2} And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness [was] upon the face of the deep.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC DT NN IN NNP VBD IN DT NN IN DT NNS .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , VB RB VB JJ : CC EX VBD NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT NN , WDT VBP PRP VBD RB JJ : CC NNP VBD DT NN IN DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:4} And God saw the light, that [it was] good: and God divided the light from the darkness.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT JJ NN , CC DT NN PRP VBD NNP .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:5} And God called the light Day, and the darkness he called Night.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC DT NN CC DT NN VBD DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And the evening and the morning were the first day.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , VB RB VB DT NN IN DT NN IN DT NNS , CC VB PRP VB DT NNS IN DT NNS .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Let there be a firmament in the midst of the waters, and let it divide the waters from the waters.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT NN , CC VBN DT NNS WDT VBP VBD CD IN DT NN IN DT NNS WDT VBP VBD CD IN DT NN : CC PRP VBD RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:7} And God made the firmament, and divided the waters which [were] under the firmament from the waters which [were] above the firmament: and it was so.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT NN NNP .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:8} And God called the firmament Heaven.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC DT NN CC DT NN VBD DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And the evening and the morning were the second day.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , VB DT NNS IN DT NN VB VBN RB JJ CD NN , CC VB DT JJ NN NN CD VBP : CC PRP VBD RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Let the waters under the heaven be gathered together unto one place, and let the dry [land] appear: and it was so.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT JJ NN NN CD NNP : CC DT NN RB IN DT NNS VBN PRP NNS : CC NNP VBD IN CD PRP VBD RB JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:10} And God called the dry [land] Earth; and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas: and God saw that [it was] good.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD , VB DT NN VB RB NN , DT NN VBG NN , NN CC VBP DT NN NN VBG NN IN PRP$ NN , WP$ NN NN VBZ CD IN PRP , IN DT NN : CC PRP VBD RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:11} And God said, Let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding seed, [and] the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed [is] in itself, upon the earth: and it was so.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC DT NN VBD RB NN , NN CC NN NN VBG NN IN PRP$ NN , CC DT NN VBG NN , WP$ NN NN VBD CD IN PRP , IN PRP$ NN : CC NNP VBD IN CD PRP VBD RB JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:12} And the earth brought forth grass, [and] herb yielding seed after his kind, and the tree yielding fruit, whose seed [was] in itself, after his kind: and God saw that [it was] good.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC DT NN CC DT NN VBD DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:13} And the evening and the morning were the third day.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , VB RB VB NNS IN DT NN IN DT NN TO VB DT NN IN DT NN : CC VB PRP VB IN NNS , CC IN NNS , CC IN NNS , CC NNS : CD CD NN CC VB PRP VB IN NNS IN DT NN IN DT NN TO VB NN IN DT NN : CC PRP VBD RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Let there be lights in the firmament of the heaven to divide the day from the night; and let them be for signs, and for seasons, and for days, and years: {1:15} And let them be for lights in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth: and it was so.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD CD JJ NNS : DT JJR NN TO VB DT NN , CC DT JJR NN TO VB DT NN : NN PRP VBD CD DT NNS RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:16} And God made two great lights; the greater light to rule the day, and the lesser light to rule the night: [he made] the stars also.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD PRP IN DT NN IN DT NN TO VB NN IN DT NN , CD CD NN CC TO VB IN DT NN CC IN DT NN , CC TO VB DT NN IN DT NN : CC NNP VBD IN CD PRP VBD RB JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:17} And God set them in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth, {1:18} And to rule over the day and over the night, and to divide the light from the darkness: and God saw that [it was] good.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC DT NN CC DT NN VBD DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:19} And the evening and the morning were the fourth day.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD , VB DT NNS VBP RB RB DT VBG NN WDT VBP NN , CC NN VBP IN NN MD VB IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:20} And God said, Let the waters bring forth abundantly the moving creature that hath life, and fowl [that] may fly above the earth in the open firmament of heaven.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD JJ NNS , CC DT NN NN WDT VBP , WDT DT NNS VBD RB RB , IN PRP$ NN , CC DT JJ NN IN PRP$ NN : CC NNP VBD IN CD PRP VBD RB JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:21} And God created great whales, and every living creature that moveth, which the waters brought forth abundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and God saw that [it was] good.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD PRP , VBG , VB JJ , CC VB , CC VB DT NNS IN DT NNS , CC VB NN VB IN DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:22} And God blessed them, saying, Be fruitful, and multiply, and fill the waters in the seas, and let fowl multiply in the earth.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC DT NN CC DT NN VBD DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:23} And the evening and the morning were the fifth day.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , VB DT NN VB RB DT NN NN IN PRP$ NN , NNS , CC VBG NN , CC NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN : CC PRP VBD RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Let the earth bring forth the living creature after his kind, cattle, and creeping thing, and beast of the earth after his kind: and it was so.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN , CC NNS IN PRP$ NN , CC DT NN WDT VBP IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN : CC NNP VBD IN CD PRP VBD RB JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:25} And God made the beast of the earth after his kind, and cattle after their kind, and every thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind: and God saw that [it was] good.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , VB PRP VB NN IN PRP$ NN , IN PRP$ NN : CC VB PRP VB NN IN DT NN IN DT NN , CC IN DT NN IN DT NN , CC IN DT NNS , CC IN PDT DT NN , CC IN DT VBG NN WDT VBP IN DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the cattle, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD IN NNP VBD NN IN PRP$ CD JJ NN NN , IN DT NN IN NNP VBD PRP PRP : NN CC JJ VBN PRP PRP .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:27} So God created man in his [own] image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD PRP , CC NNP VBD JJ PRP , VB JJ , CC VB , CC VB DT NN , CC VB PRP : CC VBP NN IN DT NN IN DT NN , CC IN DT NN IN DT NN , CC IN DT NN NN WDT VBP IN DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:28} And God blessed them, and God said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth, and subdue it: and have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over every living thing that moveth upon the earth.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC NNP VBD , NNP , PRP VBP VBN PRP DT NN NN NN , WDT VBP VBZ CD IN DT NN IN PDT DT NN , CC DT NN , IN DT WDT VBP VBZ CD DT NN IN DT NN VBG NN : TO PRP PRP MD VB IN NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And God said, Behold, I have given you every herb bearing seed, which [is] upon the face of all the earth, and every tree, in the which [is] the fruit of a tree yielding seed; to you it shall be for meat.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC TO DT NN IN DT NN , CC TO DT NN IN DT NN , CC TO DT NN WDT VBP IN DT NN , WRB RB EX VBZ CD NN , CD PRP VBP VBN CD DT JJ NN IN NN : CC PRP VBD RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:30} And to every beast of the earth, and to every fowl of the air, and to every thing that creepeth upon the earth, wherein [there is] life, [I have given] every green herb for meat: and it was so.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN CD CD CC NNP VBD DT NN IN PRP VBD VBN , CC , VB , VB PRP VBD CD RB JJ .

wl:page.wl:sentence: {1:31} And God saw every thing that he had made, and, behold, [it was] very good.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC DT NN CC DT NN VBD DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And the evening and the morning were the sixth day.
